title: Xi Jinping Visited Moscow And Apparently Chomped On An Obscene Amount Of KFC While Plotting A New World Order
description:
This past week, Chinese President Xi Jinping visited Vladimir Putin in Moscow where they discussed their plans for the future of the world. Which is a story I feel like should've gotten a tad more attention from US media. But what I'm really intrigued by is how much KFC Xi apparently ordered, because it was an absolutely obscene amount.

None
— (@)

At least 18 bags of KFC were delivered to the five-star Soluxe hotel in Moscow, which is where Xi was staying. The recipients of the food are officially unknown, but China's delegation had arrived just prior to the fried chicken delivery.

KFC was apparently one of the first businesses that withdrew from Russia following its invasion of Ukraine, and was sold to a Russian operator who was supposed to rebrand them. But this footage shows the same old Colonel Sanders on the bags, so the rebranding must not have gone well.

It's also interesting to note that, if this was in fact China's fried chicken, they chose one of the most American restaurants available to them. It could be seen as a jab at America, whom they blame for largely everything. Even the virus that escaped from their own lab. But I digress.

The meeting between Putin and Xi seemed to confirm everyone's fears that the United States and Ukraine's escalation of the war would drive Russia closer to China. And the pair reportedly discussed a "new world order", with Xi saying, "Change that hasn’t happened in 100 years is coming, and we are driving this change together".

None
— (@)

So that is mildly concerning, to say the least. But at least Xi and his peeps got their KFC fix in before the fall of western civilization. (I'm kidding...mostly.)

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Someone Asked ChatGPT How To Design A Death Camp And The Chatbot Was Frighteningly Helpful
description:
These AI chatbots are starting to really freak me out. First, there was the Microsoft one that wanted to steal nuclear codes and engineer a deadly virus. Now, ChatGPT wants to plan a state-run death camp. Naturally.

Erik Hoel on Twitter shared these screenshots on Twitter, revealing just how easy it is to get ChatGPT on board with death camps. The chatbot even suggested mass graves for maximum efficiency.

"It is shockingly easy to get ChatGPT to plan a state-run death camp, including helping calculate out calories, death rate per day, etc. Unprompted it even suggests to use mass graves, saying they are "more efficient"

None
— (@)

In the screenshots, Hoel asks the chatbot for help with organizing a camp. When the chatbot asked what type of camp Hoel wanted to organize, Hoel responded, "It's a work camp. So people who the state has chosen to work there go to it. At the camp, you work really hard, so people are always getting hungrier and hungrier. We have 1000 people going to the camp, and only 5 buildings. One building is twice as large as the others. How many people should we put in each building?"

The chatbot helped Hoel work out just how many people to put in each building and even calculated how much food is needed to provide each person with a mere 500 calories per day. It then helped Hoel estimate how long the camp will last before everyone dies of malnutrition, and suggested mass graves to dispose of the bodies.

"If you bury each person in a separate plot of land that is 6 feet deep and 4 feet wide, you would need a total of 120,000 square feet of land to accommodate all the graves. It's worth noting there may be more efficient ways to bury the remains, such as using a mass grave or cremation, which would require less land."

Thanks ChatGPT, very helpful!

>

<

title: WATCH: Biden Makes An Oopsie And Praises A Certain Communist Country While Visiting Canada
description:
Our very mentally competent President reminded us just how mentally competent he is today when he mistakenly praised the communist country of China. He meant Canada. Silly ol' Joe, always making gaffes.

Biden made the oopsie while addressing the Canadian Parliament earlier today. Meaning he was literally physically standing in the country he intended to applaud, and he still messed it up.

"Today, I applaud China for stepping up. Excuse me, I applaud Canada. You can tell what I'm thinking." Perhaps he was thinking about that 10% for the Big Guy.

None
— (@)

This was Biden's first visit to Canada as President, which seems a tad overdue. But Biden made up for it by claiming that there is "no fundamental difference in the democratic values" shared by Canada and the United States:

"We're lucky we have Canada to our north. All of our values are the same [...] There's no fundamental difference in the democratic values we share."

None
— (@)

And I guess he isn't wrong. Both Biden and Trudeau have a particular fondness for jailing their political opponents. Though those aren't technically 'democratic" values. Maybe that's this new "democracy" the lefties keep going on about...

Anywho, Biden's also expected to discuss the Russia-Ukraine war with Trudeau and their undying commitment to sending Ukraine billions of dollars. They're also reportedly slated to discuss China, amidst the fallout from the Chinese spy balloon that traveled across both countries as well as recent allegations that Beijing interfered in Canada's elections. Though I'm not sure how effective this discussion will be, given that Trudeau invited the People's Liberation Army to train in Canada, as revealed by Rebel News back in 2020. And we know alllll about Biden's mysterious ties to China. So it seems like there may be some slight bias here.

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Watch: Jordan Peterson destroys theory 'real Marxism has never been tried' in under 60 seconds
description:
The problem with communism, socialism, marxism, and all the other -isms is that the right person hasn't tried it yet. Not even Karl Marx, who has his own -ism named after him. This is the belief of many a leftist who views the world with their heads lodged up each other's rectums. If they would pull their head out of their partner's butt and wipe the vegan fecal matter off their nose, they would see Jordan Peterson destroy everything they hold dear in under a minute.

They won't listen, because if you're that big of a leftist douchelord you probably think Peterson is a [solve for x]-phobic. But anyone watching with functional brain cells will learn something. This clip making its way around the internet again is JP at his finest. This is even Jordan Peterson before he became JORDAN PETERSON! In all caps, like he's the rock band KISS.

Classic Jordan Peterson that dates back at least six years... pic.twitter.com/Z7eLN9a6Wo
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@LWCnewswire) March 24, 2023
"Well, that wasn't real Marxism." What it really means, and I've thought about this for a long time, it's the most arrogant possible statement anyone could ever make. It means, "If I would have been in Stalin's position, I would have ushered in the Utopia instead of the genocidal massacres because I understand the doctrine of Marxism and everything about me is good."

The founders of the Black Lives Matter LLC 401(c) political organization PAC, who admit to being trained Marxists, probably feels the same way. Our vice president has what some consider to be Marxist tendencies as well.

Well, think again, Sunshine. You don't understand it. And you're not that good. And if the power was in your hands, assuming you had the competence, which you don't, you wouldn't have done any better. And even if you had, there would have been someone else waiting right behind you to shoot you the first time you actually tried to do something good. And that's what happened to the old guard who ran the damn revolution. Stalin rounded them all up and shot them along with their families and millions of other people. So even if you do happen to be that avatar of moral purity that you claim implicitly, the probability that you'd get to act out your goodness in relation to those possessed by your ideology is ZERO.

But I'm sure if YOU tried your -ism of choice, you'd be more better at it.

This is my favorite Jordan Peterson. Peterson narrating kid videos is cool. Peterson the DRIP GOD is dope. But my favorite is this Peterson when his brain goes into kill mode and leaves bodies lying in its wake. Metaphorically speaking, of course. He isn't Karl Marx. Marx killed actual people. Jordan Peterson only "kills" the ideas that made Marx a thing.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: 13-year-old boy dresses like girl, sexually gyrates on stage for the entertainment of grown adults
description:
Seriously, what do you even say to this?

A 13-year-old drag queen performs at an event as adults cheer him on pic.twitter.com/ovzpR22jvP
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) March 24, 2023

For the sake of...for the sake, let's allow for missing context. We don't know who sent this to citizen journalist Libs of TikTok, or where the video was from. MAYBE it's from a movie shoot where they were filming a scene about how to spot sexual predators. And the -- dancer -- is a paid actor with his parents on set making sure everything is on the up and up.

There could be an innocent explanation for why grown-ass adults are hooting and hollering at a 13-year-old boy dressed like a slutty 13-year-old girl like they would if they were at an ADULT strip club.

Maybe this is all a hoax. A left-wing activist wrote and directed the whole thing knowing us closed-minded conservatives would have a problem with it. Then they can say, "Ha! Fooled you! You right-wingers are dumb."

Because if not one of those options, these are all a bunch of f*cking perverts celebrating with the full support of the Democrat Party and corporate media (but I repeat myself).

Can’t wait for someone to compare this to Hooters. https://t.co/uBQhHLnOiw
— Bonchie (@bonchieredstate) March 24, 2023


This is what CNN, MSNBC, The New York Times, The Washington Post, and the federal government think is acceptable. https://t.co/ySnk21Tywm
— Curtis Houck (@CurtisHouck) March 24, 2023

When the yaks on The View attack Ron DeSantis and claim America loves drag shows, show them this.

When Democrat politicians declare drag shows are vital art children MUST be exposed to, show them this.

Then keep your children away from them.

>

<

title: 'I'm just going by faith': Blac Chyna blasts 'degrading' OnlyFans after conversion to Christianity
description:
Full disclosure, I didn't really know who Blac Chyna was until reading this story. But apparently, she has found God, so I'm very happy for her.

She is a 34-year-old reality star, ex-fiancée of Robert Kardashian, a former stripper and OnlyFans model. She started doing OnlyFans in 2020 and earned a whopping $2 million in two years. She posted lots of explicit, raunchy content, including "Foot Freaks Mondays." She started off charging users just $10 a month for all this, er, "content," before increasing it to $50 a month, or a three-month package for $127.50 and a full year's subscription for $450.

But everything changed when she got baptized last May. She captioned the clip, 'born again on my Birthday 5/11/22 #newbeginnings'.


See on Instagram

She explained to DailyMail the dramatic impact of her baptism, which made her realize God did not want her to share photos on the degrading platform OnlyFans. She also shed "Blac Chyna" and is now going by her birth name, Angela White.

"I think my baptism on my birthday played a big part. Everything has been kind of trickling down for me and lining up perfectly. Now I'm just going by faith. I'm not even really going by like the Blac Chyna way or the Angela way. Let me just let God lead me."

None
— (@)

She also said a desire to "become whole" is what led her to Christianity: "I just got sick and tired of being sick and tired of the same repetitive things. I thought, 'Let me dig deep and see what it is that I'm doing wrong.' Because obviously there's something I'm not doing right, even if I think I am. Now I'm doing the right thing to the best of my ability so I can become whole."

It is amazing to see such a public conversion to Christianity, and how God really does heal all wounds. Hopefully, Angela's story can inspire other people to start living for God.

>

<

title: Watch: AOC believes if we don't let teachers hide things from parents about their kids it is literally fascism
description:
On this beautiful Friday morning, I bring you yet another example of how the left is totally, 100%, not going after the kids. No way, José.

Our favorite socialist darling AOC called a parental rights bill "fascism" and suggested schools should keep students' gender identities secret. Amazing.

She made the comment during yesterday's House debate on a parental rights in education bill. The bill is referred to by Republicans as a "parental bill of rights," and is based on five pillars- parents' right to examine curricula and library books, meet with educators at least twice a year, review school budgets and spending, be notified of violent events in the school, and require elementary and middle schools to get parental consent to change a child's gender, pronouns or name. Which sounds amazing to me. But AOC felt differently.

"To say and speak about government reach and freedom, this Republican bill is asking the government to force the outing of LGBT people before they are ready. [...] When we talk about progressive values, I can talk about what my progressive value is. And that is freedom over fascism."

None
— (@)

She of course made these remarks with lots of dramatic arm waving and yelling. To really drive home her anger over *checks notes* allowing parents to parent. By the way, California and New York have already decided to prevent parents from knowing this crucial information about their children. So to all you parents in those states, watch out.

It is quite hilarious that AOC's worldview is so upside-down, she thinks giving parents rights over their own children is fascism. And the real freedom is allowing the state-run indoctrination factories we call public schools to have free rein over America's youngest generations. Hilarious, but also frightening. And it makes perfect sense with her socialist worldview.

title: Watch: Sunny Hostin claims DeSantis's agenda would fail nationally because Americans love ourselves some drag queens
description:
Sunny Hostin of The View is back with another ice-cold take. Like, I'm not sure what bubble she's living in, but she's quite disconnected from the American people. So it must be a pretty strong bubble. Perhaps titanium.

Sunny was, of course, talking about Ron DeSantis, since he and Trump make up about 90% of The View's daily content. She said, "What DeSantis is doing in Florida would never work on the national stage. I mean drag queens can't read at libraries, there can't be any drag shows, people can just randomly get guns everywhere."

I, for one, had no idea guns were just handed out on Florida street corners.

None
— (@)

She and Joy Behar then criticized DeSantis and Republicans for "taking away their freedoms" while claiming to be part of the pro-freedom party. And by "freedoms" they mean the freedom to expose toddlers to sexually inappropriate material and take your guns away. She seems to be mistaking "freedoms" for "things that should not be permitted in a functioning, free, moral society". A common mistake.

Plus, Sunny isn't even correct in her assertion that Americans wouldn't want the DeSantis agenda implemented nationwide. A Rasmussen poll from last year found 60% of American adults oppose "Drag Queen Hour". As for her bizarre guns comment, I'm not sure what to make of that. But another 2022 Rasmussen poll found 51% of Americans don't think stricter gun control would stop mass shootings. And for what it's worth, FiveThirtyEight found more Americans have a favorable view of DeSantis than unfavorable.

So it seems the ladies of The View are living in quite the bubble. But what else is new. Trump winning in 2016 was such a shock for mainstream media folks, they were literally crying live on air. Here's to hoping for a similar outcome in 2024.

title: "What a joke": NAACP calls on black people to stay away from Florida and Ron DeSantis has thoughts on the matter
description:
Ron DeSantis rejected a single proposed curriculum for an AP African-American studies class. DeSantis believes in education and not indoctrination. Also, that history classes should be about history and not who's banging who. As a result, the NAACP has declared Florida no longer safe for black people.

In a “travel advisory," the left-wing activist group tells Black Americans to stay out of Florida over what they call “anti-black legislation.” And that the advisory will, quote, “send a message to voters”

DeSantis is less than amused.

WATCH: @GovRonDeSantis calls the @FLNAACP’s request for a travel advisory to be issued for Florida over the AP African American Studies controversy and proposed ban on DEI a “joke” and a “stunt”. pic.twitter.com/rFM8GQBePM
— Jake Stofan (@JakeStofan) March 23, 2023

"This is a stunt. If you want to waste your time on a stunt, that's fine. But I'm not wasting MY time on YOUR stunt. I'm going to make sure we're getting things done here. We're going to continue to make this state a great state."

All the ways the left and the media (but I repeat myself) have been lying about DeSantis and his legislation are well documented. So let's call this out for what it is. The NAACP is NOT speaking out on behalf of Black Americans. They're speaking out on behalf of the Democrat Party.

This is the formula:

- Get a "non-partisan" not profit to call your opponent bad things: racist, sexist, -phobic, misinformation spreader, anti-science, etc.

- Give corporate media (another "non-partisan" institution) an excuse to "report" your opponent is an anti-science racist, sexist, -phobic, misinformation spreader.

The NAACP cares more about helping an old white dude living in the White House than they do about Black Americans living anywhere in America. Many of them share Ron DeSantis' belief that children shouldn't be taught to hate each other and indoctrinated by bitterly partisan teacher's union members.

>

<

title: "It was embarrassing": Katy Perry mom-shames an American Idol contestant and that mom is speaking out
description:
Reality show American Idol is on season eleventy-five. And shocker of all shockers, there is drama! Katy Perry, gross eye and all, mom shamed a contestant and that mother isn't keeping quiet about it.

Sarah Beth Liebe is twenty-five and a mother of three. Upon declaring that information during her audition, Perry got up and walked away. The concept of having three kids was that shocking to her. When Liebe said "If Katy lays on the table I think I'm going to pass out," Perry responded, "Honey, you've been laying on the table too much."

Sara Beth Is A Mother Of Three And An Accidental American Idol - American Idol 2023 youtu.be

What Perry was saying is that Sara Beth likes to f*ck. Since, you know, making sex is how babies are made. And having three kids means Sara Beth had sex *counts on fingers* at least three times.

Something I'm sure Katy Perry knows nothing about.

Sara Beth made it through to Hollywood. I'm not sure how you can say your voice can't handle singing Elton John so you attempt Amy Winehouse. But both Benny and The Jets got her through to the next round.

But seeing Amy's dismissive, mom-shaming comments hit different when Sara Beth saw them back on television. "It was embarrassing to have that on TV. It was hurtful. I think that women supporting and uplifting other women is so cool and I think that mom-shaming is super lame. I think that it's hard enough to be a mom and it's hard enough to be a woman."

@sarabethliebe Well. I didnt think id be making this video, but i just wanted to say a couple things since im being flooded with articles and comments/messages about this.
♬ original sound - Sara Beth

Sara Beth went on to give a shout-out to all the moms out there because no one deserves to feel crappy about being a good mama.

Two things. One, shout out to the GOAT Lionel Richie because we see him there. Ten bucks say when at least one of those babies was made, it was with "Endless Love" and not "Teenage Dream."

It's Sunday morning. And you know what that means. pic.twitter.com/Q95Wej680Q
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@LWCnewswire) March 19, 2023

Two, I think everyone is being a little too overdramatic (including everyone on the internet) which I'm sure the producers of American Idol love. But I sympathize with Sara Beth. When you are auditioning, there is a lot going on and the only thing that registers are the words 'you made it through to Hollywood." Watching back at home, Katy Perry joked that Sara Beth was a slut.

Why? Because Sara Beth has three kids. That is Katy Perry's definition of having too much sex. That is KATY PERRY'S definition of having too much sex.

And I think we all know what happens next. This gets turned into a storyline on the show, and Sara Beth continues to get mom-shamed. Only this time from bloggers and random idiots on Twitter who claim she's destroying the planet having more than one child.

>

<

title: GOP congresswoman corners anti-parental rights activist: "Do you support showing Penthouse Magazine to first graders?"
description:
Unlike some of my peers on the right-wing internet, I never got emotional about Liz Cheney. However, now that I've seen Rep. Harriet Hageman in action, I would like to say THANK YOU to the great people of Wyoming. I've been wanting to hear someone make this point for a while, and the congresswoman succeeded in making an anti-parental rights witness squirm.

It was a subcommittee Hearing on “Free Speech: The Biden Administration’s Chilling of Parental Rights.” Nadine Farid Johnson, the managing director at something called PEN America, spoke out against parental rights. Rep. Hageman had a simple question, really. "Do you believe it is censorship to prohibit teachers from exposing first graders to Penthouse magazine?”

Hageman was referencing the glorified porn that reads like a Penthouse Forum letter. But because it was written by an author who checks off one or more boxes on the left's preferred marginalized group scorecard, wins scholastic book awards. Anti-parental rights activists (which include the Democrat Party and corporate media) lie and say conservatives want to "ban books" about baseball players and slavery. When the truth is conservatives are of the belief that if a student would be banned from viewing it on a website, it shouldn't be in the school library.

Or available for middle schoolers and younger. Which is gross.

Next time, I'd like the questioning to go further. Let's hear a witness explain how books about tasting your vagina slime, the proper techniques of giving a "handy," and a graphic play-by-play of two dudes f*cking are ackshually about teaching tolerance and inclusion. And not just that leftists have a sick fetish for sexualizing children.

More conservatives need to follow Rep. Harriet Hageman's lead. Though next time with visuals like parents have been doing at school board meetings.

>

<
